TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_A2_06
TestCase.Purpose: Positive test describing the Connection Establishment between the eID-Client and the eID-Server. The TC Token is retrieved via the redirect "302 Found".
TestCase.Precondition: A single basic card reader is connected to the eID-Client system.
A single active eID-Card is connected to the card reader.

TestStep.Description: [TC_TOKEN_URL] is a valid https-URL where the eID-Client expects to retrieve the TC Token.

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client is activated and starts establishment of channel TLS-1-2 to the TC Token Provider.

Command.Text: The TC Token Provider accepts the connection TLS-1-2.

TestStep.Description: The TC Token Provider uses TLS server certificate [CERT_TLS_ESERVICE_3_A] from [CERT_SET_3].

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client submits a HTTP GET to [TC_TOKEN_URL] via the channel TLS-1-2.

Command.Text: Check if the eID-Client requests the TC Token via the provided URL and respond to the eID-Client with a redirect "302 Found".

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client redirects to the URL given in the “Location" of the redirect via the channel TLS-1-2.

Command.Text: Check if the eID-Client requests the TC Token via the URL given in the “Location" of the redirect and respond to the eID-Client with a valid TC Token.

TestStep.Description: The server certificate used is [CERT_TLS_REDIRECT_1_A] from [CERT_SET_1].
The HTTP response containing TC Token has "Content-Type: text/xml" and "charset=utf-8". The response does not contain any further content besides TC Token.
TC Token contains the default parameters.
Parameter "PSK" is randomly set to value [PSK].
Parameter "SessionIdentifier" is randomly set to value [SID].

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client starts establishment of channel TLS-2 to the eID-Server.

Command.Text: The eID-Server accepts the connection TLS-2 based on [PSK].

TestStep.Description: The eID-Server uses TLS server certificate [CERT_TLS_EIDSERVER_3_A] from [CERT_SET_3].

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Server receives the message "StartPAOS" via connection TLS-2.
